analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x6bf83a9507a16e774c0f8ec74ada9314eea9e11e.sol:
	Contract IchigoToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x6bf83a9507a16e774c0f8ec74ada9314eea9e11e.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x6bf83a9507a16e774c0f8ec74ada9314eea9e11e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_contracts/0x6bf83a9507a16e774c0f8ec74ada9314eea9e11e.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x6bf83a9507a16e774c0f8ec74ada9314eea9e11e.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
